tool_description: Prices from various cryptocurrency exchanges, just Binance Kucoin and FTX at the moment
title: Crypto Prices

api_list.name: Get all Kucoin Coins
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-prices2.p.rapidapi.com/kucoin"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-prices2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Bianance Coins
